/lustre/scratch3/turquoise/rtthorn/processedFiles/na22_20191221/cuts_histograms_short_position_energy.root Name of the output root file
1 Flag to shift the calculated time by -9.92 microseconds. Should be 0 for BEAM triggers and 1 for STROBE triggers
1 Flag to reject events based off previous activity in the same DAQ window
1.6 The time to reject the event if a previous event falls before by the amount specified. The time should be in microseconds
0 Flag to turn on veto cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
3 Number of veto tubes to cut on (not needed if DoVetoCut = false)

0 Flag to reverse the veto cut or not (not needed if DoVetoCut = false) Normally events are cut if grater than or equal to NumVetoCut if ReverseVeto = 1 then events less than NumVetoCut would be removed
1 Flag to turn on prompt energy cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
10 Lowest prompt energy value allowed in PEs (not needed if DoEnergyCut = false)
100 Highest prompt energy value allowed in PEs (not needed if DoEnergyCut = false)
1 Flag to turn on a position cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
0 Lowest radius value allowed in meters (not needed if DoPositionCut = false)
0.2 Highest radius value allowed in meters (not needed if DoPositionCut = false)
-0.15 Lowest z-position value allowed in meters (not needed if DoPositionCut = false)
0.15 Highest z-position value allowed in meters (not needed if DoPositionCut = false)
0 Flag to turn on DAQ Time cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
-9.92 Lowest DAQ time value allowed in microseconds (not needed if DoTimeCut = false)
6.08 Highest DAQ time value allowed in microseconds (not needed if DoTimeCut = false)
0 Flag to turn on event length cut (0 = off, anything else = on)
0 Lowest event length value allowed in microseconds (not needed if DoLengthCut = false)
0.1 Highest event length value allowed in microseconds (not needed if DoLengthCut = false)
